item.title: About
item.description: This is a journal to keep track of my pair programming sessions with Alan.

item.title: Hello Blog
item.description: The holy grail of information https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown Some info right off the bat (for free!!) This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc.
